remarks: Other elements of a structure restriction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Nov-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
resslem.r $e |- R = ( W |`s A ) $.
resslem.e $e |- C = ( E ` W ) $.
resslem.f $e |- E = Slot N $.
resslem.n $e |- N e. NN $.
resslem.b $e |- 1 < N $.
resslem $p |- ( A e. V -> C = ( E ` R ) ) $.
